source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

spells.description: Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 986,460 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 550,680.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 5,445 primary stat for 20 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
